get started line1: Add wallet to manage your assets, control your multi assets in a single interface
get started line2: Let’s get started with setting a password
set password description:
Set a password to prevent unauthorized access
to wallet data on your application
confirm password description:
There will be No “restore password” button.
Make sure you remember it.
confirm password caption: The password will be saved on your application, we won’t be able to help if you lose your password
invalid password: Please enter a password with at least 6 characters
i dont have mnemonic phrase: I don’t have any mnemonic phrase
create new wallet description:
Please write down and safe your mnemonic phrase
It’s the ONLY WAY to restore your account
create new wallet caption: We’ll confirm on the next screen
confirm mnemonic description:
Please enter your mnemonic phrase in order and
make sure your mnemonic is written correctly
unlock password description: Enter password to unlock your application
security password description: Create a password to access your wallet
access my wallet description:
Welcome to BD Wallet, add wallet to manage your assets,
control your multi assets in a single interface
import mnemonic phrase description: A mnemonic phrase or mnemonic seed is a set of typically either 12 or 24 words, which can be used to derive an infinite number of wallets.
use mnemonic phrase backup description: Mnemonic phrase backup is your mnemonic encryption data. It includes an encryption password you set by yourself.
connect ledger device description: “Ledger” is a hardware wallet that is used for the storage of and transactions in popular cryptocurrencies
mnemonic description:
Please enter your mnemonic phrase in order and
make sure your mnemonic is written correctly
